bug.author: jiacheliu3
bug.summary: Missing ./underFSStorage directory when running Alluxio locally
bug.description:
Alluxio Version: v2.0.0-RC3 Describe the bug ./bin/alluxio validateEnv local fails due to missing ./underFSStorage directory From Alluxio cloned and built afresh, the directory ./underFSStorage is not created so running the command will give 1 failure.
Follow the Step 4 in <denchmark-link:https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/contributor/Building-Alluxio-From-Source.html>https://docs.alluxio.io/os/user/stable/en/contributor/Building-Alluxio-From-Source.html</denchmark-link>
Expected behavior ./bin/alluxio validateEnv local should not fail so the failure will not block subsequent lines. Urgency Lowest This can be easily fixed by manually creating ./underFSStorage dir. But still good-to-have to avoid confusion.
